title: U.K. Police Say 39 Bodies Found in Truck Container Near London
text:
LONDON—British emergency services found 39 bodies in a truck container at an industrial park near London and arrested the 25-year-old driver on suspicion of murder.

Essex police said the ambulance service called them to Waterglade Industrial Park in Grays, around 16 miles east of London, shortly before 1.40 a.m. Wednesday, following the discovery of the bodies. All 39—38 adults and one teenager, according to early indications—were pronounced dead at the scene and the driver, who was from Northern Ireland, was arrested.

...
description: British emergency services found 39 bodies in a truck container at an industrial park near London and arrested the 25-year-old driver from Northern Ireland on suspicion of murder.
